greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) is the number of compositions of n with k parts and differences all equal to 1 or -1.
comment: Parts will alternate between being odd and even. For even k, a composition cannot be the same as its reversal and therefore for even k, T(n,k) is even.
example: For n = 6 there are a total of 5 compositions:
program: step(R,n)={matrix(n, n, i, j, if(i>j, if(j>1, R[i-j, j-1]) + if(j+1<=n, R[i-j, j+1])) )}
T(n)={my(v=vector(n), R=matid(n), m=0); while(R, m++; v[m]+=vecsum(R[n,]); R=step(R,n)); v}
results.author: _Andrew Howroyd_, Aug 23 2019
